name: Space Bro
description:
You have to find crewmates and take them with you on the way to the space station. It's not obligatory, so you can be the only one who manages to survive.

Controls:
LMB - move
RMB - grab objects 
E - drop objects(it will increase your speed)
Space - restart the level
B - return to the menu

Game was made for 20 Second Game Jam.
